# CHANGELOG

## [1.0.1] - 2024-09-17

- Fixed example code in README.md.

## [1.0.0] - 2024-09-17

- Updated all dependencies.
- Added wheel building for Python 3.12.
- Dropped support for Python 3.7

## [0.1.1] - 2023-02-14

- Added optional argument `data` into `Sha1.__init__` method.

## [0.1] - 2023-02-13

- Initial version.
